org.dexpi.pid.imaging.drawableElements

Class TextElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dexpi.pid.imaging.drawableElements.DrawableElement
      • org.dexpi.pid.imaging.drawableElements.TextElement

  • public class TextElement
extends DrawableElement
    The text element. Describes a text with a specific font, height, position. The text can be rotated using textAngle ( in degrees). The extent is the area occupied by the text, described by a rectangle with the minimum and maximum values of x and y as corners. Currently it is not clear arround which point the text will be rotated. ( Whether its the center point or the position)
    Author:
    El Pulpo

        string - the string
        font - the font
        height - the height of the letters
        color - the color
        position - the position
        extent - the extent (minX, maxX, minY, maxY)
        textAngle - the angle of the rotated text
